title: The Fastest animal on earth
creator_credit: George Lindsay, FilmFair Communications and George Linsay Film Productions
brief_description: Gives basic facts about the cheetah, including its habits, unique physical characteristics and historicl significance. Shows cheetahs in their natural environment where their greatest enemy is man. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
